nodes.text: The Orbital Space Dock III was designed for ships over 300 meters in length, and was known to have been in Imperial service since at least a few weeks after the Battle of Yavin.

It featured numerous freighter and spacebarge hangars, and living quarters for its dock personnel. It provided repair bays for capital ships up to 600 meters in length, with bays for other smaller vessels.
An Orbital Space Dock III was constructed and placed in orbit over the planet of Bacrana by the Imperial Navy.
